subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Chris Dowe and Jeremy Kendle scored 16 points each and Bellarmine beat B.Y.U.-Hawaii, 71-68, winning the N.C.A.A. Division II championship in Springfield, Mass.
snippet: Chris Dowe and Jeremy Kendle scored 16 points each and Bellarmine beat B.Y.U.-Hawaii, 71-68, winning the N.C.A.A. Division II championship in Springfield, Mass.
